meanings.definition: Depend on with full trust or confidence.
meanings.sent1: I rely on my alarm clock to wake me up every morning.
meanings.sent2: She relies on her best friend for advice during tough times.
meanings.sent3: I can always rely on my cat to knock things off the table when I'm not looking.
meanings.sent4: Just like a sailor relies on the North Star for direction, I rely on my instincts to guide me.
meanings.sent5: In the dark forest, I rely on the glow of fireflies to light my path.

meanings.sent1: I rely on my sister to keep my secrets safe.
meanings.sent2: He relies on his lucky charm to bring him good fortune.
meanings.sent3: I rely on my dog to guard the house, but he ends up napping all day.
meanings.sent4: Just as a flower relies on the sun for energy, I rely on positivity to keep me going.
meanings.sent5: In the stormy sea of life, I rely on the lighthouse of hope to guide me to safety.
